fields.label: Enter your title
fields.errorMessage: enter your title, for example, Dr, Mr, Mrs etc.

fields.label: First name
fields.errorMessage: enter your first name

fields.label: Middle name
fields.errorMessage: enter your middle name or names

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: enter your last name

fields.infoText:
Over the next two pages you will be asked about your  Unique tax payer reference and National Insurance number.

You will need to supply at least one of these reference details.

fields.label: Unique taxpayer reference (UTR)
fields.infoText:
* This is a 10-digit number that you will have recieved when you registered for self assessment or set up a limited company

* Your UTR is on previous tax returns and other documents from HMRC, for example, notices to file a return or payment reminders
You have a National Insurance number to make sure your National Insurance contributions and tax are recorded against your name only

fields.label: National Insurance number (NINO)
fields.infoText:
* Itâ€™s made up of letters and numbers and never changes

* It's in the format 2 letters, six numbers , 1 letter

* You can find your NINO on your payslip, on your P60 and on letters about your tax, pension or benefits

* It is also In the National Insurance section of your HMRC personal tax account

fields.label: Your Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR)
fields.errorMessage: enter your UTR, this must be 10 numbers

fields.label: Your National Insurance Number
fields.errorMessage: enter your national insurance number, this must be in the format: two letters, six numbers, one letter

fields.label: Enter you address details
Your telephone number
fields.helpText: Enter your telephone number here
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid telephone number

fields.infoText: We need your consent before using email to communicate

fields.label: Read the HMRC privacy policy
fields.infoText:
Read the [HMRC Privacy policy](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/data-protection-act-dpa-information-hm-revenue-and-customs-hold-about-you/data-protection-act-dpa-information-hm-revenue-and-customs-hold-about-you) here 

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form
By supplying your email address you consent to the use of email communication

fields.label: Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.label: Do you have an agent who will be representing you for this settlement?
choices: Yes I have an agent representing me for this settlement
No I do not have an agent

fields.label: Title
First name
Last name
Agent organisation name
fields.errorMessage: enter the name of the organisation your agent works for

fields.label: Enter your agents code
fields.helpText: For example: for self assessment the agent code is SA followed by 8 numerical digits

fields.label: Enter your agents UK address details
Scheme name
fields.errorMessage: enter your scheme name

fields.label: Scheme reference number
fields.helpText: Can be up to 25 Alpha numeric characters

sections.title: How many years do you need to tell us about regarding this scheme?

fields.label: How many years do you need to tell us about regarding this scheme?
fields.errorMessage: Enter a number of years between one and twenty

fields.infoText: The tax year cannot be before 05/04/2000 or after 05/04/2019

fields.label: What do I enter on the form?
fields.infoText:
The tax year ends on the fith of April every year.

* For example, you are in a scheme between 30/06/2001 and 15/12/2001.

* In this example you would need to enter 2001

fields.label: Tell us the tax year where you recieved the loan
fields.helpText: Enter the year ending date in the format YYYY
fields.errorMessage: The year must be in the format YYYY and between 2000 and 2019

fields.label: Total loan amount for the year
Engagement Type

fields.infoText: If you intend to have this loan written off, there may be a charge to inheritance tax

fields.label: Do you intend to have this loan written off?
